body_html:
negative values exist in the latest version of nn.BCELoss().
e.g., criterion = nn.BCELoss()
print(criterion(torch.zeros(5,1),torch.zeros(5,1)))
I got: tensor(1.00000e-12 *
-1.0001)

my workaround:
criterion(torch.zeros(5,1).clamp(1e-8,1-1e-7),torch.zeros(5,1))
